name: Zeon 25
description:
This is your next great opportunity to dive into 16-bit classic consoles era and master your play-skill. Zeon 25 is an amazing 2D Shoot-’Em-’Up experience with 90’s vibes and hardcore gameplay. Push the "start" and try to finish this game.

In this game you play as a brave Corporal Johnson facing many encounters. Game features include:
- Story mode with three chapters
- More than 50 types of enemies to defeat
- Extreme boss battles
- Special arcade mode
- Ship upgrade-system
- Rhythmic soundtrack
